dialogues.text: Hi there. I'm Captain Isaac. I run the boat service between Port Azure and the mainland of Myrinnia. What can I help you with?

options.text: I would like to go to the mainland.

dialogues.text: I am still missing some supplies. But...
Perhaps you wish to help? I still need 5 mackerel, 5 azurite ore and 5 lightwood.

options.text: Yes, I'll bring you the materials you need.

dialogues.text: Great! You may first want to see the village elder, before you start your quest.
